2013 NBA Playoffs Summary

2012 Playoffs Summary 2014 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Miami Heat

Finals MVP: LeBron James (25.3 / 10.9 / 7.0)


2013 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: LeBron James (596)

TRB: Tim Duncan (214)

AST: LeBron James (152)

WS: LeBron James (5.2)
